backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining types, maps, and logic for players, teams, matches, auctions, assignments, and purse calculation with authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old player-to-team mappings into new playerAssignments with default soldAmount values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting addition of 'Sold For' column in player management and related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining steps to build, deploy, test, and roll back the frontend and backend canisters.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, root layout, profile setup modal logic, and document title.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Admin header component showing branding, admin name, and authentication controls with navigation.
frontend/src/components/AuctionSummary.t: Displays auction-wide stats and team summaries, handles CSV export, and manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/LeadingTeamIndic: Renders a badge and label highlighting the current leading team.
Manages creating matches and editing match results, including forms, dialogs, and validation.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Handles player auction flow with bidding, increment rules, and auction state polling.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: Provides CRUD operations for players, team assignments, and auction actions via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for saving a user profile name using a simple form.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Fetches and displays players bought by a team with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Header showing team name, purse, navigation, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: UI for creating teams, updating purse values, and managing owners with dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Displays all matches or matches filtered by team, including scores, status, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/TeamOwnersManage: Manages adding and removing team owner principals with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/TournamentFixtur: Generates and previews round-robin fixtures, handles form inputs, and triggers fixture creation via backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, players, teams, assignments, and related auction data with authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing players, teams, matches, auction summaries, and fixtures, using user profile data for personalization.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login via Internet Identity, redirecting users based on their profile and offering quick navigation to admin and team views.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: Displays team details, purse info, and players, supporting profile-based team selection or manual team choice when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV file summarizing team auction results including roster, prices, and purse usage.
frontend/src/utils/roundRobin.ts: Generates simple roundâ€‘robin fixtures by pairing all teams uniquely with round numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters via query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project state, existing features, and new feature requests related to showing sold amounts and updating team purse calculations.
